Uses of SAMRecordFactory in htsjdk.samtools
 

Classes in htsjdk.samtools that implement SAMRecordFactory
 class DefaultSAMRecordFactory
          Default factory for creating SAM and BAM records used by the SAMFileReader classes.

abstract  SamReaderFactory SamReaderFactory.samRecordFactory(SAMRecordFactory samRecordFactory)

 void SAMFileReader.setSAMRecordFactory(SAMRecordFactory factory)
          Deprecated. Override the default SAMRecordFactory class used to instantiate instances of SAMRecord and BAMRecord.
